name: Home Depot tokenized stock (xStock)
description: Home Depot xStock (HDx) is a tracker certificate issued as Solana SPL and ERC-20 tokens. HDx tracks the price of The Home Depot, Inc. (the underlying). HDx is designed to give eligible cryptocurrency market participants regulatory-compliant access to the stock price of The Home Depot, Inc., whilst maintaining the benefits of blockchain technology. The Home Depot is a publicly traded home improvement retailer that operates over 2,300 stores across the United States, Canada, and Mexico.
